structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.catch_line: Triple Damages For Waste During Pendency Of Action For Recovery Of Land
law.text: If, during the pendency of an action for the recovery of land, the tenant or person in possession, with knowledge thereof, commits waste, the demandant, if he recovers judgment, may afterward recover in tort three times the amount of the damages assessed therefor.
